name: Beautiful Schematas
description:
Beautiful Schematas is a game about cognitive distortions.  In each level of the game, the player experiences a different distortion and solves their way through it.

The distortions depicted in the game are: mental filters, over-generalization, disqualifying the positive, all or nothing thinking, jumping to conclusions, magnification, and emotional reasoning.

Each level in the game has its own set of unique mechanics to fit the distortions accordingly.

This game was made for May Day Mental Health Jam. As it was made for a jam, it is a prototype and has many bugs.

Controls
L/R mouse click: Move Blocks
E: Activate Ability
A/D: Rotate Camera

Credits: Everything* by Gina Al Halabi
*Except for: Isometric 3d pack by Manufactura K4, Fox model by Pxltiger, and sound by Eric Matyas
